short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your weighted and final grades easily and efficiently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looking to find out what your current weighted grade is, or wondering what you need on the final to end with a certain mark? This calculator has the answers! Its intuitive and simplistic interface makes it easy to efficiently calculate your weighted and final grades.
